If you are reading this, you have been found by the Will Council, and are required to join them. Your current xserver has basic functionality: you should be able to backup, shutdown, see your IP, and connect to the email server you have set as default through the GUI. You should also have a few tools on your system. However, for complete inauguration you must find a complete xserver.
We have set up a small series of challenges, starting at the IP at the bottom of this message. Continue until you find an xserver.
Server IP: 222.51.39.138
